name: Happy Mart: Night Shift
description:
-TW: Realistic images of meat-

You apply for a job for a normal looking supermarket since you are desperate for money. Or is it normal?

 Something is definitely festering underneath. This supermarket is hiding something.

Hello, hello!! 

Thanks for playing my little game!

This is supposed to be something short and silly featuring me and my friend's characters :D

hope you enjoy!

please excuse any mistakes you spot in the game lol
